body:
Can you take a few kb from /dev/random and try to decompress it as gzip?

On Wed, Dec 9, 2015, 5:26 PM David G. Quintas notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Hitting
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/compare/master...dgquintas:compression_coverage_2?expand=1#diff-7fafa5ac05a9939cf1c9b30b01c8e828R73
> 
> ## remains ellusive though...
>

>

> Commit Summary
> - Further coverage for compression

> File Changes

> - https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/4381.diff

> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/4381.

Not really portable :-)

Marry that with the read from random from some other Python script.

Can one of the admins verify this patch?
